description: Piattaforma di formazione AI per manager aziendali. 4 laboratori da 6 ore ciascuno, con metodologia Lean-AI, strumenti pratici (n8n, Antigravity, Comet, Claude Code), e focus su privacy, sicurezza e governance aziendale.

userStories.title: Home Page con 4 Laboratori
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to see a home page with 4 lab cards so that I can navigate the course structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page displays 4 laboratory cards: Lab 1 (Lean + AI Intro), Lab 2 (Governance), Lab 3 (Workflow Building), Lab 4 (Integration & Handover)
Each card shows lab number, title, duration (6h), and brief description
Cards link to respective lab pages
MetàHodos design with Saira Condensed font and brand colors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 1: Modulo Lean - Mappatura Processi
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to map my current process (AS-IS) so that I can identify inefficiencies before automation.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab1/lean-mapping with interactive process mapper
User can add process steps with: name, description, time, responsible, pain points
Visual flow diagram of the process
Waste identification checklist (7 Lean wastes: Overproduction, Waiting, Transport, Over-processing, Inventory, Motion, Defects)
Export process map as JSON
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 1: Modulo Lean - Redesign TO-BE
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to redesign my process eliminating waste so that I have a simplified version ready for automation.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab1/lean-redesign that loads AS-IS from previous module
User can mark steps as: Keep, Eliminate, Simplify, Automate
Side-by-side comparison AS-IS vs TO-BE
Calculate time savings percentage
Generate simplified process ready for Lab 3
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 1: Privacy e Sicurezza AI
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to understand privacy and security implications of AI so that I can make informed decisions.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab1/privacy-security with educational content
Sections: Data Privacy (GDPR basics), AI Security Risks, Best Practices
Interactive checklist: 'Is my data safe?' with questions about data sensitivity
Warning cards for common mistakes (sharing sensitive data with public LLMs)
Quiz with 5 questions on privacy/security
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 2: LLM Aziendali e Governance
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to understand corporate LLM policies so that I use approved tools.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab2/corporate-llm with governance content
Explain difference: Public LLMs vs Enterprise LLMs vs Self-hosted
Table comparing: ChatGPT, Claude, Azure OpenAI, AWS Bedrock, local models
Section on 'Ask your IT': template questions for IT department
Decision tree: 'Which LLM should I use for my use case?'
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 2: RAG - Retrieval Augmented Generation
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to understand RAG so that I can leverage company knowledge bases with AI.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab2/rag-explained with visual explanation
Animated diagram showing: Documents → Embeddings → Vector DB → Query → LLM → Answer
Real-world examples: Company FAQ bot, Document Q&A, Knowledge base search
Benefits section: accuracy, up-to-date info, source citations
Limitations section: setup complexity, data quality dependency
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 2: Matrice Decisionale Strumenti
userStories.description: As a manager, I want a decision matrix so that I know when to use n8n vs Antigravity vs Comet vs Claude Code.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab2/tool-matrix with interactive decision tool
Matrix with criteria: Complexity, Technical skill required, Use case type, Output type
Tool profiles: n8n (workflows), Antigravity (apps), Comet (browser automation), Claude Code (coding assistance)
Interactive questionnaire that recommends the right tool
Examples for each tool with screenshots or diagrams
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 3: n8n Hands-On Workshop
userStories.description: As a manager, I want step-by-step guidance to build my first n8n workflow so that I can automate my simplified process.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab3/n8n-workshop with tutorial content
Step 1: Install/access n8n (cloud vs self-hosted options)
Step 2: Understanding nodes (Trigger, Action, Logic)
Step 3: Build a simple workflow (Webhook → IF → Slack/Email)
Integration with existing Workflow Generator from /workflow-generator
Video placeholder or animated GIF showing the process
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 3: Comet Browser Automation
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to understand browser automation so that I can extract data or automate web tasks.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab3/comet-automation (enhance existing /browser-agentici)
Use cases: Web scraping, Form filling, Price monitoring, Report download
Step-by-step: How to use Comet for a simple task
Privacy warning: What data is captured, where it goes
Legal considerations: Terms of service, robots.txt
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 3: Antigravity App Generation
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to create simple apps with AI assistance so that I can build internal tools without coding.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab3/antigravity-workshop (enhance existing /app-generation)
What Antigravity can build: Dashboards, Forms, Internal tools
Prompting techniques for better results
Example: Build a simple expense tracker in 10 minutes
Limitations: What requires IT involvement
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 4: Claude Code per Casi Avanzati
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to understand when Claude Code is useful so that I can leverage it for complex scenarios.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab4/claude-code with advanced content
When to use Claude Code: Data analysis, Script generation, Code review
Example: Analyze Excel data with Claude Code prompts
Example: Generate a Python script for data transformation
IT collaboration: How to hand over generated code
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 4: Testing e Iterazione
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to test my workflow with real data so that I can validate it works correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab4/testing with testing methodology
Testing checklist: Happy path, Edge cases, Error handling
How to involve stakeholders in testing
Iteration loop: Test → Feedback → Improve
Signs your workflow is ready for IT handover
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 4: Template Documentazione IT
userStories.description: As a manager, I want a documentation template so that IT can understand and industrialize my workflow.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab4/handover-template with interactive form
Sections: Process Overview, Workflow Diagram, Data Flow, Credentials Required, Error Handling, SLA Expectations
Auto-fill fields from previous labs where possible
Export as PDF or Markdown
Checklist: 'Is my documentation complete?'
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Lab 4: Cerimonia di Handover
userStories.description: As a manager, I want guidance for the IT handover meeting so that the transition is smooth.
acceptanceCriteria: Create page /lab4/handover-ceremony with meeting guide
Agenda template for handover meeting
Key questions IT will ask (and how to answer)
Responsibility matrix: What manager maintains vs what IT owns
Success criteria for handover
Certificate of completion placeholder
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Navigation e Lab Progress Tracker
userStories.description: As a manager, I want to track my progress through the labs so that I know what I've completed.
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar or header navigation showing all 4 labs and their modules
Progress indicator (percentage or checkmarks)
State persistence using localStorage
Ability to mark modules as complete
Lab overview pages (/lab1, /lab2, /lab3, /lab4) showing module list
Typecheck passes
